name: Mango Lassi
description: Refreshing Indian yogurt drink with fresh mango. Creamy, cooling and perfectly spiced.

instructions.instruction: Add mango, yogurt, milk, honey and cardamom to blender.

instructions.tip: Add more ice for colder drink.

instructions.instruction: Check consistency - add milk to thin if needed.
Pour into glasses, top with chopped pistachios.

tips: Mango must be very ripe for natural sweetness.
Use frozen mango for thicker consistency.
Cardamom found at Indian grocers - essential for flavor.
Use coconut yogurt for vegan version.
storageInfo: Best consumed immediately. Blend and drink within 2 hours.
servingSuggestion: Pair with spicy food or enjoy on hot summer days.
variations: Add rose water for aromatic version.
Add saffron for a luxurious touch.
Add half banana for mango-banana lassi.
